languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, Веабос-6 — место мрачное и суровое, но господин Антар, как бы это выразиться, сделал его совсем невыносимым. Он тут свою систему ввел... Смены начинаются с покаянного бичевания, потом смотр — за малейшую провинность десять плетей положены, потом обыски тщательные и снова наказание. И я сейчас только про тюремщиков говорю!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Vheabos VI is a grim and dismal place, but — how shall I put this — Master Anthar has made it unbearable. He has introduced new policies... Each shift now begins with a penitential scourging followed by an inspection. Even the slightest offence merits ten lashes, a thorough search, and yet more punishment. And I'm talking about the jailers here!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, Веабос-6 — место мрачное и суровое, но господин Антар, как бы это выразиться, сделал его совсем невыносимым. Он тут свою систему ввел... Смены начинаются с покаянного бичевания, потом смотр — за малейшую провинность десять плетей положены, потом обыски тщательные и снова наказание. И я сейчас только про тюремщиков говорю!"

languages.text: 「閣下、ヴィアボス・VIは厳しく陰鬱な場所ですが…どう言えばいいのでしょう…マスター・アンサールがそれを耐え難いものにしてしまいました。彼は新しい政策を導入したのです…現在、各シフトは懺悔の鞭打ちから始まり、その後検査が行われます。ほんの些細な違反でも十回の鞭打ち、徹底的な捜索、そしてさらに厳しい処罰が待っています。しかも、ここで言っているのは看守たちのことです！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Vheabos VI is a grim and dismal place, but — how shall I put this — Master Anthar has made it unbearable. He has introduced new policies... Each shift now begins with a penitential scourging followed by an inspection. Even the slightest offence merits ten lashes, a thorough search, and yet more punishment. And I'm talking about the jailers here!"

traits.locale_text: 「閣下、ヴィアボス・VIは厳しく陰鬱な場所ですが…どう言えばいいのでしょう…マスター・アンサールがそれを耐え難いものにしてしまいました。彼は新しい政策を導入したのです…現在、各シフトは懺悔の鞭打ちから始まり、その後検査が行われます。ほんの些細な違反でも十回の鞭打ち、徹底的な捜索、そしてさらに厳しい処罰が待っています。しかも、ここで言っているのは看守たちのことです！」

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Vheabos-VI ist ein düsterer und elender Ort, aber – wie soll ich sagen – Meister Anthar hat ihn unerträglich gemacht. Er hat neue Regeln eingeführt ... Jede Schicht beginnt jetzt mit Peitschenhieben zur Strafe, gefolgt von einer Inspektion. Selbst das geringste Vergehen bedeutet zehn Hiebe, eine gründliche Durchsuchung und noch mehr Strafe. Und ich rede hier von den Wärtern!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Vheabos VI is a grim and dismal place, but — how shall I put this — Master Anthar has made it unbearable. He has introduced new policies... Each shift now begins with a penitential scourging followed by an inspection. Even the slightest offence merits ten lashes, a thorough search, and yet more punishment. And I'm talking about the jailers here!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Vheabos-VI ist ein düsterer und elender Ort, aber – wie soll ich sagen – Meister Anthar hat ihn unerträglich gemacht. Er hat neue Regeln eingeführt ... Jede Schicht beginnt jetzt mit Peitschenhieben zur Strafe, gefolgt von einer Inspektion. Selbst das geringste Vergehen bedeutet zehn Hiebe, eine gründliche Durchsuchung und noch mehr Strafe. Und ich rede hier von den Wärtern!"

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, Vhéabos-VI est un endroit aussi maussade que lugubre, mais... comment le formuler... la présence de maître Anthar a rendu cette planète tout bonnement invivable.Il a mis en place de nouveaux protocoles...Chaque service débute par une flagellation pénitentielle, suivie d'une inspection. La plus petite des infractions est punie d'une dizaine de coups de fouet, d'une fouille approfondie et d'un châtiment supplémentaire. Et je parle là du traitement réservé aux geôliers ! »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Vheabos VI is a grim and dismal place, but — how shall I put this — Master Anthar has made it unbearable. He has introduced new policies... Each shift now begins with a penitential scourging followed by an inspection. Even the slightest offence merits ten lashes, a thorough search, and yet more punishment. And I'm talking about the jailers here!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, Vhéabos-VI est un endroit aussi maussade que lugubre, mais... comment le formuler... la présence de maître Anthar a rendu cette planète tout bonnement invivable.Il a mis en place de nouveaux protocoles...Chaque service débute par une flagellation pénitentielle, suivie d'une inspection. La plus petite des infractions est punie d'une dizaine de coups de fouet, d'une fouille approfondie et d'un châtiment supplémentaire. Et je parle là du traitement réservé aux geôliers ! »

languages.text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, Vheabos VI es un lugar sombrío y deprimente, pero... a ver cómo se lo explico... maese Anthar lo ha vuelto insoportable. Ha implementado nuevas políticas. Ahora cada turno debe empezar con una flagelación penitencial, seguida de una inspección. Incluso la más mínima infracción se castiga con diez latigazos, un registro a fondo y sanciones ulteriores. ¡Y esto para los carceleros!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Vheabos VI is a grim and dismal place, but — how shall I put this — Master Anthar has made it unbearable. He has introduced new policies... Each shift now begins with a penitential scourging followed by an inspection. Even the slightest offence merits ten lashes, a thorough search, and yet more punishment. And I'm talking about the jailers here!"

traits.locale_text: «{mf|Milord|Milady}, Vheabos VI es un lugar sombrío y deprimente, pero... a ver cómo se lo explico... maese Anthar lo ha vuelto insoportable. Ha implementado nuevas políticas. Ahora cada turno debe empezar con una flagelación penitencial, seguida de una inspección. Incluso la más mínima infracción se castiga con diez latigazos, un registro a fondo y sanciones ulteriores. ¡Y esto para los carceleros!».

languages.text: “大人，维博斯六号星一直都是个阴森、可怕的地方，不过……我该怎么说呢……自从安萨大师来了之后，这里的日子简直都没法过了。他推出了新的规定……他来了之后，每次轮班开始，所有人都得先挨一顿鞭子，之后才能开始检查。哪怕是最轻微的过错，也要挨上十鞭，还会被彻底搜查，之后被收拾得更惨。我这说的还不是囚犯，是我们这些看守！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Vheabos VI is a grim and dismal place, but — how shall I put this — Master Anthar has made it unbearable. He has introduced new policies... Each shift now begins with a penitential scourging followed by an inspection. Even the slightest offence merits ten lashes, a thorough search, and yet more punishment. And I'm talking about the jailers here!"

traits.locale_text: “大人，维博斯六号星一直都是个阴森、可怕的地方，不过……我该怎么说呢……自从安萨大师来了之后，这里的日子简直都没法过了。他推出了新的规定……他来了之后，每次轮班开始，所有人都得先挨一顿鞭子，之后才能开始检查。哪怕是最轻微的过错，也要挨上十鞭，还会被彻底搜查，之后被收拾得更惨。我这说的还不是囚犯，是我们这些看守！”

languages.text: "Vheabos VI, acımasız ve kasvetli bir yerdir {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama nasıl söylesem... Üstat Anthar burayı katlanılmaz hâle getirdi. Yeni kurallar getirdi... Artık her vardiya; önce tövbekâr bir kamçılama, ardından da bir inceleme ile başlıyor. En ufak bir hatada on kırbaç, baştan aşağı bir arama ve üzerine daha da fazla ceza alıyorsunuz. Üstelik bunlar zindancılara yapılıyor!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Vheabos VI is a grim and dismal place, but — how shall I put this — Master Anthar has made it unbearable. He has introduced new policies... Each shift now begins with a penitential scourging followed by an inspection. Even the slightest offence merits ten lashes, a thorough search, and yet more punishment. And I'm talking about the jailers here!"

traits.locale_text: "Vheabos VI acımasız ve kasvetli bir yer {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri ama nasıl söylesem... Efendi Anthar burayı katlanılmaz hâle getirdi. Yeni kurallar getirdi... Artık her vardiya önce tövbekâr bir kamçılama, ardından da bir inceleme ile başlıyor. En ufak bir hatada on kırbaç, baştan aşağı bir arama ve üzerine daha da fazla ceza alıyorsunuz. Üstelik bunlar zindancılara yapılıyor!"
